Title: The 14 Amazons
Writer: Yang Kao (story: The Legend of the Yang Family), Kang Cheng (screenplay)
Actors: Hua Tsung, Mei Sheng Fan, Chung-Hsin Huang, Feng Tien
Plot: The cast of The 14 Amazons is a veritable "who's who" of the golden age of Shaw Brothers swordplay adventures, and was not only a major box office hit (ranking 4th for 1972), but also a top prize winner, including Best Support Actress for Lisa Lu, a special citation for outstanding lead female performance for Lily Ho, Best Director for Cheng Kang, and an award for Honorable Mention for Drama.
